changes.comment: The vitest eslint config has been updated to disable the 'vitest/max-expects' rule and enable the 'vitest/no-commented-out-tests', 'vitest/no-identical-title', 'vitest/no-import-node-test', 'vitest/require-to-throw-message', 'vitest/valid-describe-callback', and 'vitest/valid-expect' rules.
